_comment: Add a _ before an option name to comment it out and it wont be added to the apworld
Using 'goal' as the name of an option let you override some of the generated goal parameters
goal.description:
Choose your Goal condition.
- Complete The Ruins: Defeat the Toriel Corruption at the end of The Ruins.
- Complete Snowdin: Defeat the Papyrus Corruption at the end of Snowdin.
- Complete Waterfall: Defeat the Undyne Corruption at the end of Waterfall.
- Disrespect Hotland: Defeat the Alphys Corruption at the beginning of Hotland, negating any other need to go to Hotland other than post-Goal.
- Complete The CORE: Defeat the Mettaton Corruption at the end of The CORE.
- Complete New Home: Defeat the Asgore Corruption at the end of New Home.
- Complete Card Kingdom: Defeat the Ralsei Corruption at the end of Card Kingdom.

if you include a "values" you can define the label for certain values
Currently the only use for Range in Manual outside of hooks is 'filler_trap'
